page.title: 05SCOTT'S DAY
page.content: I am Scott Walker,aged 9,and I live just in the NW corner of the block in Lee Terrace. I go to Scholes J&I School.On Monday 24th June I got up at 8am,got dressed and had my breakfast of Shreddies.Then I cleaned my teeth,washed and walked 1/2km up hill to school for 8.55am. After assembly I wrote a story about The Lost Caves. Then it was playtime and I played football. Next we did maths work on shapes.Then I went home at 11.55am for a dinner of baked beans on toast before returning for 1.15pm. During PE I practised limbo dancing for our school carnival .After school at 3.45pm my friend Andrew and I went to my grandma's for tea.Then we went to Hepworth feast and I went in for a running race,but I lost. Afterwards we went to the football club and I had 3 drinks of pop before bed at 9.45pm.
